ProjectTitle: Towards the Next Generation Fast and Energy Efficient Arc-Resistance Hybrid Additive Manufacturing (ARHAM).

2. Data: you don't have to list your own presentations in a DMP
3. Ethics/Legal: please contact LRD later in your project to discuss valorisation and whether this may impact sharing.  
6. Preservation: please note the KU Leuven RDM policy recommends 10 year of preservation (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy)
7. Sharing: you can also consider using a repository for sharing such as KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) RDR gives your data a DOI and metadata which makes it more findable and citable.
label: good with suggestions
